org.easybatch.core.writer

Interface RecordWriter<R extends Record>

  • Type Parameters:
    R - the type of record to write
    All Superinterfaces:
    RecordProcessor<R,R>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRecordWriter, BlockingQueueRecordWriter, CollectionBatchWriter, CollectionRecordWriter, FileBatchWriter, FileRecordWriter, HibernateBatchWriter, HibernateRecordWriter, JdbcBatchWriter, JdbcRecordWriter, JmsQueueRecordWriter, JpaBatchWriter, JpaRecordWriter, MongoDBBatchWriter, MongoDBRecordWriter, MsExcelRecordWriter, OutputStreamBatchWriter, OutputStreamRecordWriter, StandardOutputBatchWriter, StandardOutputRecordWriter, StringBatchWriter, StringRecordWriter

    public interface RecordWriter<R extends Record>
extends RecordProcessor<R,R>
    Marker interface for all record writers.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      R processRecord(R record)
      Write a record to a data sink.

    • Method Detail

      • processRecord

        R processRecord(R record)
                               throws RecordWritingException
        Write a record to a data sink.
        Specified by:
        processRecord in interface RecordProcessor<R extends Record,R extends Record>
        Parameters:
        record - the record to write.

        the record that has been written
        Throws:
